title: graphic design conference
content:
Hey there experts

I was just wondering if you guys or gals could inform about what graphic design conference I shouldn't miss. I can't make it to typecon this year and are also looking for something wider that (do I dare) "just" type. Now I love type - I do - but It's a long way from copenhagen and I wan't my moneys worth... if you know what I mean?

So should I just wait for next years typecon or is there something out there that is really cool attending? The obvious as well because I really have no idea about this...

Thanks

Mark,  
Copenhagen
author: TheMark
